commonText.title: Settings panel
commonText.titleComment: get comfy while we organize your life :)
commonText.titleDescription: Here you can set up everything just once and then let it run
commonText.watchingDescription: Add the folders that you'd like to be organized to the list by clicking the blue button
commonText.noWatchingFoldersWarning: Oops! there are no folders selected, click up above to add them!
commonText.noDestinationFoldersWarning: Oops! there are no folders selected, click up above to add them!
commonText.destinationDescription: Select the files destination with the sorting parameters as you'd like
commonText.resetPersonalConfiguration: reset all the configuration to the initial

alerts.watchingPathAlreadySelected: The following path is already selected:
alerts.destinationPathAlreadySelected: The selected path is already set as a destination, we selected it so you can change it's properties
alerts.destinationPropertyAlreadySelected: is already selected as a sorting property
